name: Learn: World Map
description:
With Learn: World Map your kid will be able to learn about the continents and oceans, spelling, and pronunciation. 

Includes three modes:

1. Learn

   -Touch the continent or ocean picture or spelling to hear the pronunciation.

2. Play

   -Learn while having fun. Move the continents around to snap them where they belong.

3. Challenge

   -Different challenge types. (Can be configured in settings)

   -Your kid will have to select the correct answer out of three options.

   -Challenge types:

      -Match Word - Match the part of the place image with the corresponding word spelling.

      -Match Image - Hear and see the word spelling, and match with the correct place of the map image.

   -Objects to match can be configured in settings

Different languages available. (Can be configured in settings)

Let us know about other learning activities you would like to add!!
